actions.list: See all the actions that are changing the world
actions.add: Want to share your action? Do it here!

callToActionExplanations.seeMakers: See our heroes without a cape

auth.validationProcess: We are verifying your phone number. You will receive a verification code to this number to finish the {action, select, 0 {login} other {registration}} process.
auth.nameHelperText: What do you like to be called? This is how you will be known in the community.

common.motto: Supporting actions that change the world
common.logInPrompt: Register if you haven't already. Log in if you have.
common.meta_comment: TODO(techiejd): Move all things that are Actions under a Maker and move their common components under maker.

solicitHelpDialog.title: Ask for support
solicitHelpDialog.reminderThatTheyCanSolicitMoreByEditingM: Remember, you can ask for other types of (non-financial) help <link>by requesting it in your maker page</link>.

all.title: Ask for all
all.prompt: I would love to collaborate on my social impact.

testimonial.title: Ask for a testimonial
testimonial.prompt: Please give me a testimonial on my social impact.

sponsorship.title: Ask for sponsorship
sponsorship.prompt: I am looking for sponsorships of my social impact.

connect.title: Ask to connect
connect.prompt: Let's connect over my social impact

supportDialog.title: Thank you for the support!
supportDialog.share: {beneficiaryType, select, action {Take a look at this cool social action. Let's support it!} other {Take a look at this awesome Maker. Let's support them!}}

contactSupportDialog.missingInfoTitle: The maker has yet to finish their profile.
contactSupportDialog.title: The maker says you can contact them through these ways:
contactSupportDialog.missingInfoText: Â¡Thanks for wanting to support! We have alerted the maker about your interest and we hope your ask convinces them to finish quickly.

currency.chooseWiselyWarning: Elige sabiamente. Solo puedes elegir la divisa en este primer patrocinio, porque almacenamos este dato.

tip.prompt: Want to leave a tip for OneWe?
tip.showUsYourLove: Show us!, how much you love us.
tip.forTheService: For the service we provide you through the platform.

fee.prompt: Want to cover the payment processing fee?
fee.preferMakerPays: I prefer the maker pays the fee

publicizeSupporter.prompt: Shall we tell the OneWe Community?
publicizeSupporter.makerKnows: The Maker always knows who sponsors them
publicizeSupporter.publicizeSupporterExplanation: If you choose to publicize your sponsorship, your name and profile picture will be visible to the greater OneWe community.
publicizeSupporter.publish: I want the OneWe community to know I sponsor this Maker.

actions.emptyTestimonials: There are no testimonials, yet. Add one!

upload.title: Â¡Publish your action! ðŸª§
upload.logInPrompt: In order to publish an action, you must first register as a member.

media.title: Show us a bit of what you've done
media.prompt: Upload a photo or video of your action.

summary.title: Summarize your action

examples.title: Good summary examples
examples.1: We taught 150 children from a low-income school to use AI to better their lives.
examples.2: I filled 1 bag with garbage from the river near my house.
examples.3: We built an irrigation system for a community of 200 people in the Amazon.

summary.prompt: This summary will become your action's title.

impactedPersons.title: Whom have you helped?
impactedPersons.example: Ex: San Ignacio High School class of 2023, San Francisco, California.

solicit.title: {makerName}, Get testimonials and get more engagement!
solicit.noTarget: You did not indicate the beneficiary community to send this survey, but we trust you to find the right people.
solicit.solicitText: Please give me your opinion on my action: {for}
solicit.clickOnEarToSolicit: Click on the ear to send them a survey asking for a testimonials.

actions.empty: There are no actions, yet. Add one!

requests.opinion: Please give me your opinion on my social impact for my action: {summary}
requests.look: Take a look at my social action.
